content: For those who work with WebMoney.I exchange WMZ for bitcoins or more or less well-known alts, +5% to the current rate. Up to 500 WMZ. If we agree, perhaps a permanent and long-term cooperation.You can write here or in PM.UpdateI will also exchange WMZ for USDT (TRC-20).

comments.body: do you accept bitcoin talk escrow?
